body_html:
Yours is a totally different setting: different OS, different drivers, different card, different way of calculating ram, so I don't really know if that's telling anything. My best guess is that the reason for the leak i am experiencing has to do with CUDA / CuDNN for linux, so if that's true testing on Windows wouldn't help debugging unfortunately.
Also, 1.2GB seems a lot of ram for this, in my case, when it doesn't leak, the script uses just 461MB. I have no idea why this is the case unfortunately. A tensorflower would be helpful here :)
